resources.string:
numAi brings modern LLMs (ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Gemini and more) to your old Android device.

To start, you'll need an API key. This app will guide you through the process. All you need is a modern smartphone or PC.

The guide will use the free VoidAI provider. If you already have an API key or use another provider, press the Skip button.

1. On a modern browser, go to the following URL and create an account.
voidai.app/register
If you use Gmail, enter your email without the dots before @gmail.com.
2. After logging in, navigate to the API Keys section in your dashboard.
3. Click Generate New API Key.
4. Copy the key that appears and transfer it to your phone using one of these methods:

Method 1: File transfer
• Create a text file with only the API key and save it.
• Transfer the file to your phone via USB, Bluetooth, gtrxac.fi/fh or similar.
• You will be able to import the key from the file on the next screen.

Method 2: adb
• On the next screen, press on the text input box, and paste the key using this command:
adb shell input text API_KEY

Website protection services such as Cloudflare block connections from Android <2.3, as they consider them unsafe. Most AI platforms, including VoidAI, use such protections, so you may not be able to connect to them from your device and you have to use something else.

You just need to use a different API — for example, Ollama. It doesn't block your device, but registration with it may differ.

Detailed instructions await you on the numAi GitHub page.
github.com/gohoski/numAi
An error happened. Check your API key and try again.
In some Android 2.x UIs, a ToggleButton may be taller than a regular button, causing the interface to look slightly uneven. This option attempts to fix this issue (though not ideally).
API key changed; please press OK and return to Settings menu before choosing models

Failed to send message:
%s

For images, change the model to Qwen3-VL-235B, GPT-5, or Gemini 3.

Note: even if the models are successfully retrieved on the next screen, this does not mean that you have definitely entered the key correctly. If you have entered the key incorrectly, you will see a corresponding error in the chat interface.
